title: Stairs
description: Adding a staircase enhances the look of your residence or business. FG Masonry will design and build stairs to customer specifications using quality yet affordable materials.

title: Pavers
description: We construct beautiful patios and we will work together to find the best option for you.

title: Retaining Wall
description: Brick, Block, and Stone walls are the majority of our work. We have masons that have the knowledge and experience to lay any masonry material from glass block to real granite veneer.

title: Driveway
description: We specialize in quality driveway paving, installation and repairs. From classic asphalt paving to custom paver and cobblestone projects.

title: Walkway
description: We construct beautiful stairways and walkways and will work with you to find the best option for you.

title: Excavation
description: Excavation is an important and risky task, no matter what the goals are. At FG Masonry, we take this very seriously. That is why we invest in the best professionals, safe equipment, and proper methods to ensure that all excavation work is done properly.
